item.title: XR Summit and AWE Nite | XR with AI, Gaming, AVGC
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: ðŸš€ Excited to announce that Iâ€™ll be part of the XR Summit 2024 hosted by XTIC, IIT Madras, a hub for driving innovation in XR technologies in India! ðŸŒŸ IIT Madras, with its state-of-the-art Haptics Lab and the IoE Center for VR and Haptics, supported by the CAVE consortium (via XTIC.org), is at the forefront of advancing experiential technologies.
